mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum num, post1.* FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, post.* FROM ( SELECT cp.CSPOSTNUM, cp.title, TO_CHAR(cp.CREATEDAT, 'yyyy-mm-dd') createdAt FROM CSPOST cp WHERE csPostType = #{csPostType} ORDER BY CREATEDAT ASC ) post ORDER BY rnum DESC ) post1 ) WHERE num >= ((#{rowNum}-1)*10)+1 AND num <= #{rowNum}*10

SELECT cspostnum, csboardnum, usernum, title, content, TO_CHAR(createdat,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss') createdAt, TO_CHAR(updatedat,'yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss') updatedat, DECODE(status,1,'미처리',2,'완료') status, DECODE(csposttype,100,'공지사항',200,'문의사항',300,'신고글',400,'이벤트') type FROM csPost WHERE csPostNum = #{csPostNum}
